summary: This is a service request record for the Federal Bureau of Prisons (FBOP) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. It documents a request to move recording equipment (AMS and SVRs) to the computer services server room to enable full-time access, requiring a serial number to obtain a new IP address for the new location.

persons.name: Jeff Cranor
persons.context: Listed as assigned to the service request to move recording equipment at the MCC New York.

persons.name: Jeff McKenzie
persons.context: Listed as assigned to the service request and noted as working on moving the recording equipment at the MCC New York.

persons.name: Justin Houston
persons.context: Listed as assigned to the service request to move recording equipment at the MCC New York.

events.title: Service request to move recording equipment at MCC New York
events.description: A service request was created to move AMS and SVR recording equipment to the computer services server room at the Metropolitan Correctional Center New York to enable full-time access, requiring a serial number for a new IP address.

keyFacts: The document is a service request for the Federal Bureau of Prisons at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York.
The request involves moving recording equipment (AMS and SVRs) to the computer services server room for full-time access.
A serial number was needed to obtain a new IP address for the equipment in its new location.
The request was created on September 9, 2019, and assigned to technicians Jeff Cranor, Jeff McKenzie, and Justin Houston.
